items.name: what
items.title: Why Choose Ship SaaS One Click?
items.description: We provide an all-in-one AI SaaS startup solution, letting you focus on product innovation rather than infrastructure.

items.title: Complete User System
items.description: Integrated Supabase authentication, supporting multiple third-party logins, user management made easy.

items.title: Internationalization Support
items.description: Built-in i18n multilingual system, one-click translation for global market expansion.

items.title: Payment Integration
items.description: Stripe payment integration, supporting both one-time payments and subscription models.

items.name: why
items.title: Features Tailored for AI SaaS
items.description: We understand the needs of AI SaaS entrepreneurs and provide a suite of ready-to-use AI features.

items.title: AI Landing Page Generator
items.description: Generate professional product landing pages with one click, supporting multilingual conversion.

items.title: Blog & Documentation System
items.description: MDX-based blog system with AI-assisted writing and translation support.

items.title: AI API Integration
items.description: Pre-configured OpenAI interface for quick AI feature implementation.

items.name: how
items.title: Launch Your SaaS in Three Steps
items.description: From zero to launch in just three simple steps:

items.title: 1. Clone Template
items.description: Clone the repository with one click to get the complete project structure.

items.title: 2. Configure Services
items.description: Follow documentation to set up Supabase, Stripe, and other services.

items.title: 3. Deploy
items.description: One-click deployment to Vercel and start serving users instantly.

feature.title: Why Developers Choose Us?
feature.description: We provide a modern tech stack and complete feature modules to help you build professional SaaS products quickly.
feature.tip: Over 1000+ developers have successfully launched projects using our template

items.title: Modern Tech Stack

items.title: i18n Support

items.title: Payment System

cta.title: Ready to Launch Your SaaS Project?

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Common questions about Ship SaaS One Click.

items.title: What technical background do I need to use this template?
items.description: If you're familiar with React and Next.js basics, you'll be able to use this template well. We provide detailed documentation for guidance.

items.title: Which deployment platforms are supported?
items.description: We primarily support Vercel deployment, but also work with other platforms like Netlify, Railway, etc.

items.title: How can I get technical support?
items.description: We provide detailed documentation and video tutorials, plus community support through GitHub Issues.

defaultNames.name: Raven Blackthorn
defaultNames.description: A name combining the mysterious raven with the gothic blackthorn, suggesting a dark and enigmatic character. Common in gothic fantasy and dark romance novels, often associated with mysterious powers or troubled past.
defaultNames.review: Perfect for dark fantasy or gothic romance protagonists.

defaultNames.name: Sterling Nightshade
defaultNames.description: Sterling implies nobility and worth, while Nightshade adds a dangerous, poisonous element. Suitable for an anti-hero or noble villain in fantasy novels.
defaultNames.review: Balanced blend of aristocratic and dangerous elements.

defaultNames.name: Aurora Moonweaver
defaultNames.description: Combines celestial Aurora with the mystical Moonweaver. Typically represents a magical character with ties to celestial or lunar powers in fantasy fiction.
defaultNames.review: Excellent for magical or ethereal female characters in fantasy.

defaultNames.name: Drake Ironheart
defaultNames.description: Drake suggests dragon heritage, while Ironheart implies strength and determination. Common in epic fantasy for warrior characters or dragon-related protagonists.
defaultNames.review: Strong heroic name suitable for fantasy protagonists.

price_onetime.title: Simple Pricing Plans
price_onetime.description: Choose the perfect plan for your creative needs
price_onetime.tip: All planss include one-time payment with no recurring fees

plans.name: Basic Plan
plans.description: Perfect for individual writers and hobbyists

plans.name: Professional Plan
plans.description: Ideal for professional writers and creative teams

faq.question: How many names can I generate with one credit?
faq.answer: One credit allows you to generate up to 10 character names with detailed backgrounds and descriptions.

faq.question: Do credits expire?
faq.answer: Basic plan credits are valid for 1 year. Professional plan credits never expire.

faq.question: Can I upgrade my plan later?
faq.answer: Yes, you can upgrade to the Professional plan at any time. Your remaining credits will be converted accordingly.

faq.question: What payment methods do you accept?
faq.answer: We accept all major credit cards, PayPal, and other popular payment methods.
